item.title: Spotify 希望向视频创作者付费以在平台上播放节目
item.description:
这家音乐和播客服务公司希望加强其视频目录，并将为此支付高达七位数的费用

。【原文：

The music and podcast service wants to beef up its video catalog and will pay up to seven-figures to do so

】

item.title: 美国寻求修复洗钱控制措施，富国银行股价下跌
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）股价下跌，此前该银行与美国货币监理署（Office of the Comptroller of the Currency）达成协议，要求该贷款机构加强检测洗钱和遵守国际制裁的系统。【原文：Shares of Wells Fargo & Co. fell after the bank reached a deal with the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency requiring the lender to beef up systems for detecting money laundering and complying with international sanctions.】

item.title: 拉里奥哈债权人因债券纠纷在纽约获赔 4000 万美元
item.description: 一名美国法官命令阿根廷拉里奥哈省向债权人支付近 4000 万美元的赔偿金，因为该省未能就其债务支付一系列利息和本金。【原文：A US judge ordered Argentina’s La Rioja province to pay creditors nearly $40 million in damages for failing to make a series of interest and principal payments on its debt.】

item.title: 微软和网络公司在 CrowdStrike 中断后寻求变革
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）表示，在 CrowdStrike 控股公司（CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.【原文：Microsoft Corp. said it’s building an alternative for cybersecurity companies that now utilize the deepest layer of its operating system after a flawed update from CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. triggered a global IT meltdown.】

item.title: 亚马逊向合同配送投入 21 亿美元，提高工资水平
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）计划在其合同交付项目上额外支出 21 亿美元，包括安全计划、培训和为承包公司增加薪酬。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. plans to spend an additional $2.1 billion on its contract delivery program, including safety programs, training and additional pay for the contracting firms.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称，场外套现可将债券市场损失降至最低
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）表示，投资者正利用大量现金锁定全球债券市场的诱人收益率，帮助限制资产类别的损失。【原文：Investors are using their massive cash piles to lock in attractive yields in global bond markets, helping to limit losses in the asset class, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会将于下周就美国股票交易改革方案的部分内容进行表决
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会将于下周投票表决近二十年来对股票市场规则的一些最大修订，包括交易定价和处理方式。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission will vote next week on some of the biggest revisions to stock-market rules in almost two decades, including how trades are priced and processed.】

item.title: OpenAI 和 Nvidia 高管与拜登官员讨论人工智能基础设施需求
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）和英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋周四在白宫会见了拜登政府高级官员和其他行业领袖，讨论如何满足人工智能项目对基础设施的巨大需求。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman and Nvidia Corp. CEO Jensen Huang met with senior Biden administration officials and other industry leaders at the White House on Thursday to discuss how to fill the massive infrastructure needs for artificial intelligence projects.】

item.title: OpenAI 发布具有推理能力的 o1 模型
item.description:
这款内部称为 "草莓 "的新型机型可以处理复杂的数学和编码问题。【原文：

The new model, known internally as Strawberry, can handle complicated math and coding problems. 

】

item.title: 英国官员在伦敦交通黑客攻击事件后逮捕少年
item.description: 英国执法人员逮捕了一名与本月初伦敦地铁系统网络攻击事件有关的少年。【原文：Law enforcement officials in the UK have arrested a teenager in connection with a cyberattack earlier this month on London’s metro system.】

item.title: 拉加德未就降息提供帮助，欧洲央行等待答案
item.description: 周四，欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）和她的同事们正在等待有关经济急剧恶化的数据，以及这将如何影响通胀率。【原文：Clues on when the European Central Bank will next cut interest rates were in short supply on Thursday, with President Christine Lagarde and colleagues awaiting data on how drastically the economy is deteriorating — and how that will shift inflation.】

item.title: 股指回调如何仍能成为赢家
item.description:
在本期万亿节目中，我们将解释为什么一些从 S&P 500 或罗素 1000 指数中剔除的股票会在新的交易所交易基金中大行其道。【原文：

On this episode of Trillions, we explain why some equities knocked off of the S&P 500 or Russell 1000 are populating a new exchange-traded fund.

】

item.title: 维托尔聘用嘉能可（Glencore）和特拉菲古拉（Trafigura）铁矿石交易商以推进金属业务
item.description: 维托尔集团正在从竞争对手嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）和特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）挖走铁矿石贸易商，这家全球最大的石油贸易商正加紧努力向金属领域扩张。【原文：Vitol Group is poaching iron ore traders from rivals Glencore Plc and Trafigura Group, as the world’s biggest oil trader ramps up its efforts to expand into metals.】

item.title: 美国法官允许美国人用衍生品为选举下注
item.description: 一名联邦法官已经为活动合约交易所 Kalshi 公司开了绿灯，允许美国人就 2024 年国会选举结果下注多达 1 亿美元。【原文：A federal judge has given a green light to event contract exchange Kalshi Inc. to let Americans bet as much as $100 million on the outcome of the 2024 congressional elections.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率降至 2023 年 2 月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率降至 2023 年 2 月以来的最低点。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US dropped to the lowest since February 2023.】

item.title: 欧洲央行尚未关闭十月降息的大门
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，欧洲央行理事会成员还不能排除在 10 月 17 日的下一次决策中降息的可能性，即使降息的可能性不大。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council members aren’t yet in a position to rule out an interest-rate cut at their next decision on Oct. 17 even if such a move is unlikely, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 即使降息，企业的利息成本仍将继续上升
item.description: 蓝筹股公司在支付美元债券利息方面的支出正在增加，即使美联储今年降息也不会立即扭转这一趋势。【原文：Blue-chip companies are spending more money on US dollar bond interest payments, and even Federal Reserve rate cuts this year won’t immediately reverse the trend.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织官员因与米莱伊不和而退出阿根廷会谈
item.description: 国际货币基金组织与阿根廷的最高谈判代表在招致阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的愤怒后，已将与这个南美国家的会谈委托给同事进行。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s top negotiator with Argentina has delegated talks with the South American nation to colleagues after drawing the ire of President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 美国财政年度即将结束，预算缺口达 1.9 万亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦预算赤字在 8 月份激增，距离本财政年度结束还有一个月的时间，因为利息成本上升继续拖累总体收支平衡。【原文：The US federal budget deficit surged in August with one month to go until the end of the fiscal year as higher interest costs continued to weigh on the overall balance.】

item.title: 丹麦央行降息四分之一个百分点，与欧洲央行看齐
item.description: 丹麦央行降息四分之一个百分点，与欧元区央行看齐，捍卫克朗与共同货币挂钩的地位。【原文：Denmark’s central bank delivered a quarter-point interest-rate cut to match its euro-area counterpart and defend the krone’s peg to the common currency.】

item.title: 旧金山一座耗资 10 亿美元的大厦因诉讼案而蒙上阴影
item.description: 旧金山最具标志性的建筑之一在历时四年、耗资 2.5 亿美元的改造后重新开业，这标志着这座城市的复兴。但它的重新开业却是在其主要租户之一提起诉讼的阴影下进行的。【原文：One of San Francisco’s most iconic buildings is celebrating its reopening after a four-year, $250 million makeover meant to symbolize the city’s renewal. It’s doing so under the shadow of a lawsuit from one of its key tenants.】

item.title: 交易平台 eToro 与美国证券交易委员会达成和解，限制美国加密货币活动
item.description: EToro USA LLC 同意支付 150 万美元，并只允许美国客户在其平台上交易少数加密货币，以了结美国证券交易委员会对其作为未注册经纪商和清算机构运营的指控。【原文：EToro USA LLC agreed to pay $1.5 million and allow American customers to only trade only a handful of cryptocurrencies on its platform to settle US Securities and Exchange Commission allegations that it operated as an unregistered broker and clearing agency.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司的詹恩出售了超过一半的 A 类股票
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司负责保险业务的副董事长 Ajit Jain 出售了其持有的价值 1.39 亿美元的巴菲特企业集团 A 类股。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s vice chair of insurance operations, Ajit Jain, sold $139 million worth of his Class A shares in Warren Buffett’s conglomerate.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称部分人欢迎奥塞勒收购德国商业银行
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）和德国商业银行（Commerzbank）之间的合作将受到那些一直呼吁加强欧元区金融业一体化的人们的欢迎。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said that a tie-up between Italy’s UniCredit SpA and Germany’s Commerzbank would be welcomed by those who’ve been calling for greater integration in the euro area’s financial sector.】

item.title: 亚洲市场萎缩，英国航空加倍发力利润丰厚的美国市场
item.description: 明年夏天，英国航空公司将提供创纪录数量的飞往北美的航班，因为该航空公司将加倍努力开拓其最赚钱的市场。【原文：British Airways will offer a record number of flights to North America next summer as the carrier doubles down on its most profitable market.】

item.title: 大型对冲基金缩减资产，Point72 计划返还数十亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司正准备首次向投资者返还部分资金，加入多行政对冲基金同行的行列，在经历一段爆炸式增长后寻找限制资产的方法。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management is preparing to return some capital to investors for the first time, joining multistrategy hedge fund peers looking for ways to restrict their assets after a period of explosive growth.】

item.title: Verizon 将每季度计提高达 19 亿美元的离职费用
item.description: Verizon Communications Inc. 第三季度将因裁员 4,800 人而产生高达 19 亿美元的税前费用。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. will take a pre-tax charge of as much as $1.9 billion in the third quarter tied to 4,800 planned job cuts.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行就供过于求发出警告，美光遭遇罕见熊市呼声
item.description: 由于法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas Exane）警告称，美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc. shares tumbled on Thursday, with the maker of computer memory chips extending a recent selloff as BNP Paribas Exane warned that the stock would continue to underperform others connected to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 乌克兰称俄罗斯袭击船只后小麦创两个月新高
item.description: 在乌克兰称俄罗斯用导弹袭击了一艘粮船后，小麦期货跳涨了2.2%。【原文：Wheat futures jumped as much as 2.2% after Ukraine said Russia hit a grain ship with a missile.】

item.title: 灰度公司为第七大加密代币提供信任，XRP 随之上涨
item.description: 加密资产管理公司灰度投资公司（Grayscale Investments）表示，它已开始发售灰度 XRP 信托基金（Grayscale XRP Trust），帮助第七大数字资产的价格上涨了近 10%。【原文：Crypto asset manager Grayscale Investments said it has begun to offer the Grayscale XRP Trust, helping to send the price of the seventh-largest digital asset up by almost 10%.】
